abstract: A report saying that Vivendi was holding out for more money in its negotiations to sell its 20 percent stake in NBC Universal to majority owner General Electric left some wondering just how far apart the two firms were on price.
snippet: A report saying that Vivendi was holding out for more money in its negotiations to sell its 20 percent stake in NBC Universal to majority owner General Electric left some wondering just how far apart the two firms were on price.
lead_paragraph: A report saying that Vivendi was holding for more money in its negotiations to sell its 20 percent stake in NBC Universal to majority owner General Electric left industry observers wondering just how far apart the two firms were on price.

headline.main: G.E. and Vivendi Said to Be $1 Billion Apart on NBC
